strong.font: Welcome to South Pointe Junior High HOME OF THE GRIFFINS!

div.div: Melissa Barnett, School Leader | ​217 East Olympic Drive, Phoenix, AZ. 85042 | P (602) 243-8496 | Monday - Friday 7:30 am - 4:00 pm

div.font:
​​South Pointe Junior High School is a public charter school that has your family's needs in mind.
As a part of the South Pointe K-12 Learning Community, we are serving grades 6-8.​

div.style: background-image: url("/uploads/4/3/9/7/4397552/background-images/770031317.jpg") ;background-repeat: no-repeat ;background-position: undefined undefined ;background-size: 100% ;background-color: transparent ;background-size: cover;background-attachment: fixed;

h2.font:
Empower Yourself to Empower Others!​
Dream! Believe! Grow!

div.div:
The South Pointe Learning Community is K-12!
Enroll your whole family in our Elementary School, Junior High, and High School for the full community effect!

h2.font: Like our Page and Visit us on Facebook!

blockquote.font: ​If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything. - Mark Twain
I've learned that you shouldn't go through life with a catcher's mitt on both hands; you need to be able to throw something back. - Maya Angelou
Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn. - ​Benjamin Franklin
